title: Detox DPO — Flourish | Compounding + Nutrition

cleaned_text: liver detoxification and energy 120 capsules Supports Balanced Detoxification (Phases I & II) Supports Liver Health and Energy Generation Promotes a Variety of Phase II Pathways Supports Natural Antioxidant Mechanisms Detox DPO is formulated to support phase I and phase II detoxification, hence the term "Dual Phase Optimizers." and calcium D-glucarate support critical steps in the complex process of detoxification—a function essential to overall health and vitality. This unique formula provides activated B vitamins for enhanced bioavailability, including 5-methyltetrahydrofolate (5-MTHF) DPO provides antioxidant support to minimize the damaging effects of free radicals generated between the two phases.
